verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Galaad, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* stock \w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w came|strong="H7126"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* thou shouldst \w divide|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* thou shouldst \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Salphaad \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* due \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* father:

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w follow|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* transferred \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* diminishing \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w jubilee|strong="H3104"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fiftieth year \w of|strong="H1121"\w* remission, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* distribution \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* lots \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* confounded, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* others.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* rightly.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* law promulgated \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* touching \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Salphaad: \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w marry|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w*, \w only|strong="H0389"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*.

Lest \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* mingled \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* marry wives \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* kindred:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3423"\w* \w husbands|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* mingled \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w remain|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w*

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* separated \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Salphaad \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Maala, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Thersa, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Hegla, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Melcha, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Noa \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w married|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w by|strong="H0802"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* father,

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w remained|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.
